text: @TMobile @Tesla #TMobileTuesdays +#contest I would get my best friend and take a cross country road trip that We would stop at every mall and Cracker Barrell that was in our path. Practicing  COVID-19 safety measures of course. Not to mention stopping at estate sales and  resale shops,
